feature.name: prevent_tunnel_update_rif
feature.doc: if sys_inlif is null, then tunnel lif does not update inlif array

define.name: use_mdb_size
define.doc: Some lif sizes are not taken from dnx data, but from the mdb. Use this flag to indicate if it should be used, or just use default minimal value.

define.name: nof_global_l2_gport_lifs
define.doc: The mpls and vlan ports don't have enough bits to support the full global lif address. Their number is limited by this value.

define.name: glem_rif_optimization_enabled
define.doc: Amount of out RIFs one GLEM entry can hold for optimized GLEM usage is 4.

define.name: wa_null_lif
define.doc: ERPP GLEM trap requires NULL LIF to be added to GLEM by default.

numeric.name: nof_global_in_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of in global lifs in the device.

numeric.name: nof_global_out_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of out global lifs in the device.

numeric.name: egress_in_lif_null_value
numeric.doc: IN_LIF null value in egress stage.

feature.name: mapped_in_lif_profile
feature.doc: defines the existence of mapped inlif profile

feature.name: in_lif_profile_iop_mode
feature.doc: defines the existence of inlif profile in iop mode

define.name: inlif_index_bit_size
define.doc: This is the size of a single index in the inlif table. Divide the entry bit size by this to get its size in indexes.

define.name: inlif_minimum_index_size
define.doc: The minimum size in indexes of an inlif entry

define.name: inlif_resource_tag_size
define.doc: The size of the inlif resource's n-packs. The packs are used to prevent fragmentation by assigning each pack a fixed entry size. The pack should be the least common denominator of every possible entry side. See the SDD for full description.

define.name: nof_in_lif_profiles
define.doc: Number of possible in_lif profiles.

define.name: nof_used_in_lif_profile_bits
define.doc: Number of used in_lif_profile bits out of 8.

define.name: nof_used_eth_rif_profile_bits
define.doc: Number of used eth_rif_profile bits.

define.name: nof_in_lif_incoming_orientation
define.doc: Number of possible in_lif profile incoming orientation groups.

define.name: nof_eth_rif_profiles
define.doc: Number of possible eth_rif profiles.

define.name: nof_da_not_found_destination_profiles
define.doc: Number of da_not_found_destination profiles.

define.name: default_da_not_found_destination_profile
define.doc: Default da_not_found_destination profile.

define.name: drop_in_lif
define.doc: local in_lif id performing trap with drop action.

define.name: mc_bridge_fallback_per_lif_profile
define.doc: Enable/Disable the MC bridge fallback functionality based on LIF profile

numeric.name: in_lif_profile_allocate_indexed_mode
numeric.doc: number of values needed for property indexed_mode in in_lif_profile

numeric.name: in_lif_profile_allocate_orientation
numeric.doc: number of values needed for egress property in_lif_orientation in in_lif_profile

numeric.name: in_lif_profile_allocate_policer_inner_dp

numeric.doc: number of values needed for egress property ive_outer_qos_dp_profile in in_lif_profile.

numeric.doc: number of values needed for egress property in_lif_profile_allocate_same_interface_mode in in_lif_profile.

define.name: nof_out_lif_profiles
define.doc: Number of possible out_lif profiles.

define.name: nof_erpp_out_lif_profiles
define.doc: Number of possible erpp_out_lif profiles.

define.name: nof_out_lif_outgoing_orientation
define.doc: Number of possible out_lif profile outgoing orientation groups.

define.doc: The number of bits in the outrif profile from GLEM.

define.doc: The number of bits in GLEM result.

define.doc: How many bits from the outlif pointer are used to indicate the physical bank.

define.name: nof_outlifs_in_eedb_banks
define.doc: The estimated number of entries that are stored in eedb banks.

define.name: outlif_eedb_banks_pointer_size
define.doc: pointer size used to access eedb banks.

numeric.name: outlif_pointer_size

numeric.name: allocation_bank_size
numeric.doc: Size of the outlif bank used by the outlif allocation algorithm.

numeric.name: local_outlif_width
numeric.doc: Size of the outlif bank used by the outlif allocation algorithm.

numeric.name: outlif_profile_width
numeric.doc: The number of bits in the outlif profile from GLEM.

numeric.name: nof_local_out_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of potential local outlifs in the device. Derived from the pointer size.

numeric.name: physical_bank_size
numeric.doc: Size of the outlif bank used by the phase map and mags. Derived from the outlif pointer size and the physical bank pointer size.
